  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_115040</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_115040</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Order and disorder in a liquid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ordnung und Störung in einer Flüssigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commande et désordre dans un liquide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ordem e disorder em um líquido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ordine e disordine in un liquido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατάταξη και αναταραχή σε ένα υγρό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orden y desorden en un líquido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a liquid having short-range order as designated by the dashed line and long-range disorder indicated by the bracket.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">long-range disorder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">short-range order</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Flüssigkeit, die 
short-range Ordnung hat, wie durch die gestrichelte Zeile und die 
weitreichende Störung gekennzeichnet, die durch den Haltewinkel 
angezeigt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un liquide ayant la 
commande à courte portée comme indiquée par le désordre à ligne 
pleine et à longue portée indiqué par la parenthèse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um líquido que tem a 
ordem short-range como designada pela linha tracejada e pelo disorder 
de longo alcance indicados pelo suporte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un liquido che ha 
ordine a corta portata come indicato dal disordine a linea 
tratteggiata ed a lungo raggio indicato dalla staffa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα υγρό που έχει την 
περιορισμένου φάσματος κατάταξη όπως υποδεικνύεται από την 
ορμούμενη γραμμή και τη μεγάλης ακτίνας αναταραχή που 
υποδεικνύονται από το υποστήριγμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un líquido que tiene 
orden de corto alcance según lo señalado por el desorden de línea 
discontinua y de largo alcance indicado por el corchete.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüssigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weitreichende Störung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">short-range Ordnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zustände des Stoffes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gaz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liquide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">désordre à longue portée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Particules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commande à courte portée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Líquido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">disorder de longo alcance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Partículas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ordem short-range</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
